title: Curse toe
data:

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                         | [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rElec](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |

|   |                                                                                          |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A disembodied toe, hanging in the air and radiating an intense field of negative energy. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

One of *Crawl'*s sillier monsters, **curse toes** are hovering severed toes with extremely dangerous abilities. They can [torment](/Torment "Torment") you, and summon [mushroom](/Wandering_mushroom "Wandering mushroom") or [deathcaps](/Deathcap "Deathcap") around you to block your escape. They also have good defenses, and create clouds of [miasma](/Miasma "Miasma") when travelling. Thankfully, curse toes move slowly. They can be encountered in [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot"), certain unpleasant [Crypt](/Crypt "Crypt") and [Tartarus](/Tartarus "Tartarus") [vaults](/Vault "Vault"), and Tartarus-themed [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") floors.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                             |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Symbol of Torment](/Symbol_of_Torment "Symbol of Torment") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Summon Mushrooms](/Summon_Mushrooms "Summon Mushrooms")    | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- A weapon of [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") or [Dispel Undead](/Dispel_Undead "Dispel Undead") makes fighting them a little easier. You can limit the impact of their torments and their summons' drain life with [rN](/Negative_energy#Negative_Energy_Resistance "Negative energy") or [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form"), and negate them entirely by being undead or in [lichform](/Lichform "Lichform").

  - A [potion of lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") will make you immune to torment. Just beware of anything else that could be lurking near.
  - Curse toes are unaffected by [silence](/Silence "Silence").

- Most elemental damage is all but useless against their resistances. [Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") is only partially resisted, however, so area-of-effect [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage spells such as [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") and [Ozocubu's Refrigeration](/Ozocubu%27s_Refrigeration "Ozocubu's Refrigeration") will at least be somewhat effective.

## History

- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), curse toes could only summon wandering mushrooms with their Summon Mushroom spell, but knew [Summon Undead](/Summon_Undead "Summon Undead") as well.

Curse toe

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
curse toe z 
HP 64-131
HD 14
XP 4719
Speed 10 (move: 140%)
AC 25
EV 1
Will Immune



Resistances rF+++
rC+
rElec
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Tiny
Type curse toe, curse toe
Flags Evil
See invisible
Flying
Unbreathing
Speaks
A disembodied toe, hanging in the air and radiating an intense field of negative energy.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

One of Crawl's sillier monsters, curse toes are hovering severed toes with extremely dangerous abilities. They can torment you, and summon mushroom or deathcaps around you to block your escape. They also have good defenses, and create clouds of miasma when travelling. Thankfully, curse toes move slowly. They can be encountered in the Realm of Zot, certain unpleasant Crypt and Tartarus vaults, and Tartarus-themed Ziggurat floors.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Symbol of Torment Magical flag
Slot2 Summon Mushrooms Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • A weapon of holy wrath or Dispel Undead makes fighting them a little easier. You can limit the impact of their torments and their summons' drain life with rN or Statue Form, and negate them entirely by being undead or in lichform.
    • A potion of lignification will make you immune to torment. Just beware of anything else that could be lurking near.
    • Curse toes are unaffected by silence.
  • Most elemental damage is all but useless against their resistances. Ice Magic is only partially resisted, however, so area-of-effect cold damage spells such as Freezing Cloud and Ozocubu's Refrigeration will at least be somewhat effective.

History

  • Prior to 0.13, curse toes could only summon wandering mushrooms with their Summon Mushroom spell, but knew Summon Undead as well.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
One of ''Crawl'''s sillier monsters, '''curse toes''' are hovering severed toes with extremely dangerous abilities. They can [[torment]] you, and summon [[wandering mushroom|mushroom]] or [[deathcap]]s around you to block your escape. They also have good defenses, and create clouds of [[miasma]] when travelling. Thankfully, curse toes move slowly. They can be encountered in [[the Realm of Zot]], certain unpleasant [[Crypt]] and [[Tartarus]] [[vault]]s, and Tartarus-themed [[Ziggurat]] floors.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*A weapon of [[holy wrath]] or [[Dispel Undead]] makes fighting them a little easier. You can limit the impact of their torments and their summons' drain life with [[Negative_energy#Negative_Energy_Resistance|rN]] or [[Statue Form]], and negate them entirely by being undead or in [[lichform]].
**A [[potion of lignification]] will make you immune to torment. Just beware of anything else that could be lurking near.
**Curse toes are unaffected by [[silence]].
*Most elemental damage is all but useless against their resistances. [[Ice Magic]] is only partially resisted, however, so area-of-effect [[cold]] damage spells such as [[Freezing Cloud]] and [[Ozocubu's Refrigeration]] will at least be somewhat effective.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], curse toes could only summon wandering mushrooms with their Summon Mushroom spell, but knew [[Summon Undead]] as well.
